content.question: Which of the following best describes a meaning of the lines “Steal away, steal away home, / I ain’t got long to stay here”?

choices.label: To mourn enslaved people who had been transported to the lower South
To communicate information regarding locations of maroon communities
To resist the dehumanizing condition of enslavement
To alert enslaved people of opportunities to escape enslavement

content.answer: To alert enslaved people of opportunities to escape enslavement

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
